title: Science Instructional Design Program for Diverse Educational Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Establishment of smartphone-based VR simulation environments, enabling role-experience learning linked to real educational settings.

learning_goals: Achieve the ability to explain scientific concepts in three or more ways to an audience with diverse learning backgrounds (middle school level)
Design and execute educational scenarios in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy
Iteratively improve educational materials at least three times incorporating peer review and expert feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
